original: mā hīnaḥ paribhūto vā mā bhūt kaścicca durmanāḥ // Bca_10.41 //
analyzed: mā hīnaḥ paribhūtaḥ vā mā bhūt kaścid ca durmanāḥ
pāṭha svādhyāya kalilāḥ vihārāḥ santu susthitāḥ

original: nityaṃ syāt saṃghasāmagrī saṃghakāryaṃ ca sidhyatu // Bca_10.42 //
analyzed: nityam syāt saṃgha sāmagrī saṃgha kāryam ca sidhyatu
viveka lābhinaḥ santuḥ śikṣā kāmāḥ ca bhikṣavaḥ
karmaṇi acittāḥ dhyāyantu sarva vikṣepa varjitāḥ
lābhinyaḥ santu bhikṣuṇyaḥ kalaha āyāsa varjitāḥ
bhavantu akhaṇḍa śīlāḥ ca sarve pravrajitāḥ tathā
duḥśīlāḥ santu saṃvignāḥ pāpa kṣaya ratāḥ sadā
sugateḥ lābhinaḥ santu tatra ca a khaṇḍita vratāḥ
paṇḍitāḥ satkṛtāḥ santu lābhinaḥ paiṇḍapātikāḥ
bhavantu śuddha saṃtānāḥ sarva diś khyāta kīrtayaḥ
a bhuktvā āpāyikam duḥkham vinā duskara caryayā
divyena ekena kāyena jagat buddhatvam āpnuyāt
pūjyantām sarva saṃbuddhāḥ sarva sattvaiḥ anekadhā
acintya bauddha saukhyena sukhinaḥ santu bhūyasā
sidhyantu bodhisattvānām jagat artham manorathāḥ

original: yaccintayanti te nāthās tat sattvānāṃ samṛdhyatu // Bca_10.49 //
analyzed: yat cintayanti te nāthāḥ tat sattvānām samṛdhyatu
pratyekabuddhāḥ sukhinaḥ bhavantu śrāvakāḥ tathā
deva asura naraiḥ nityam pūjyamānāḥ sa gauravaiḥ

original: jātismaratvaṃ pravrajyām ahaṃ ca prāpnuyāṃ sadā /
analyzed: jātismara tvam pravrajyām aham ca prāpnuyām sadā
yāvat pramuditām bhūmim mañjughoṣa parigrahāt
yena tena āsanena aham yāpayeyam bala anvitaḥ
viveka vāsa sāmagrīm prāpnuyām sarva jātiṣu

original: yadā ca draṣṭukāmaḥ syāṃ praṣṭukāmaśca kiṃcana /
analyzed: yadā ca draṣṭu kāmaḥ syām praṣṭu kāmaḥ ca kiṃcana
tam eva nātham paśyeyam mañju nātham avighnataḥ
daśa diś vyoma paryanta sarva sattva artha sādhane

original: yadācarati mañjuśrīḥ saiva caryā bhavenmama // Bca_10.54 //
analyzed: yat ācarati mañjuśrīḥ sā eva caryā bhavet mama
ākāśasya sthitiḥ yāvat yāvat ca jagataḥ sthitiḥ
tāvat mama sthitiḥ bhūyāt nighnataḥ

original: yatkiṃcijjagato duḥkhaṃ tat sarvaṃ mayi pacyatām /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid jagataḥ duḥkham tat sarvam mayi pacyatām

original: bodhisattvaśubhaiḥ sarvair jagat sukhitamastu ca // Bca_10.56 //
analyzed: bodhisattva śubhaiḥ sarvaiḥ jagat sukhitam astu ca
lābha satkāra sahitam ciram tiṣṭhatu śāsanam
mañjughoṣam namasyāmi yat prasādāt matiḥ śubhe

original: kalyāṇamitraṃ vande 'haṃ yat prasādācca vardhata iti // Bca_10.58 //
analyzed: kalyāṇamitram vande haṃ yat prasādāt ca vardhate iti
bodhi caryā avatāre pariṇāmanā paricchedaḥ daśamaḥ
